text: "Tik Tok" (styled "TiK ToK") is the first solo single by American singer- songwriter Kesha. It is from her first studio album, Animal. The song topped charts worldwide, including countries like the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, and the United States, where it was the best-performing song of 2010. It is Kesha's second single after the number-one single "Right Round" by rapper Flo Rida; her vocals are not credited on this song. Category:Kesha songs Category:2009 songs
title: Tik Tok
